name: Evripidis Xenakis
story: Evripidis Xenakis joined the Greek army at a young age and quickly rose through the ranks with his impressive marksmanship and leadership skills. He served with distinction during several conflicts before deciding to retire from military service. However, his love for his country and desire to continue serving led him to join the Independent faction in the current conflict. He is determined to do whatever it takes to protect Greece and its people.
